class.name: EditorSceneFormatImporterBlend
class.description:
EditorSceneFormatImporterBlend imports ".blend" files through the glTF2 3d import pipeline.
The "filesystem/blender/blender_path" editor setting sets the location of the blender binary.
The "filesystem/blender/enabled" toogle can be found in the project setting.
Blender export using glTF2 "use keep separate" mode requires Blender 3.0 and above to reference external textures.
